name: Snakie
description:
Snakie Line-strategical game for funs of 2D Games. The main hero is circle snake that creates linear body with holes. The main idea is to make strategy to block the way of other players picking skill objects and rotating snake.

Game has strategy part. The main part to win the game is to block out  ways of other players and bots in the game. It's important to not collide with other obstacles and objects. It's permitted to collide with "Skill objects".The game has also levels to play with bots.Main objects:

->"Snakie" is the main object in the game. It's controlled by rotating. It has it's own initial speed and in different levels speed of object is different. When it collides with another object, it explodes and the player loses game.

->"SpeedIncreaser".This object gives opportunity to increase the speed of "Snakie" and make tricks. It's very useful for overtaking bot or the other player and block the way. The skill will be active for 5 seconds after taking it.

->"SpeedDecreaser".After taking this object "Snakie" becomes slower. It's useful in small world, when speed is so fast and space is small. It becomes easier to go trough holes when the speed is smaller. Becomes deactivated after 5 seconds of taking it...

The main way to control the Snake is to rotate it using the control buttons. Basically, the Left Arrow and Right Arrow buttons are preferred to control the game. It differs only in the "Play With Friends" levels, where players can use the same computer to play together. There you can use "A", "B", "Left Arrow" to turn the "Snake" to the left, and "D", "M", "Right Arrow" to turn the "Snake" to the right. When playing with 4 players, you can also use a computer mouse.
